mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LESSON_LIST VALUES( seq_lesson_list.nextval, 1, 1, #{lesson_subj}, sysdate, #{lesson_type}, #{lesson_price}, #{lesson_thumbnail}, #{lesson_short_cont}, '진행', #{lesson_kit} )
mapper.select: SELECT LESSON_LIST.LESSON_SUBJ, LESSON_LIST.LESSON_THUMBNAIL, LESSON_LIST.LESSON_SHORT_CONT, TEACHER.T_NAME FROM LESSON_LIST, TEACHER WHERE T_NAME='두껍'
SELECT * FROM LESSON_LIST WHERE LESSON_IDX=4
mapper.update: UPDATE LESSON_LIST SET LESSON_SUBJ=#{lesson_subj}, LESSON_TYPE=#{lesson_type}, LESSON_PRICE=#{lesson_price}, LESSON_THUMBNAIL=#{lesson_thumbnail}, LESSON_SHORT_CONT=#{lesson_short_cont}, LESSON_KIT=#{lesson_kit} WHERE LESSON_IDX=2
mapper.select: SELECT B.U_NAME, B.LESSON_BUY_DATE, B.LESSON_RECORD_IDX, LL.LESSON_SUBJ FROM LESSON_LIST LL,(SELECT A.*, LS.LESSON_IDX FROM LESSON_SCHEDULE LS,(SELECT LR.*, U.U_NAME FROM LESSON_RECORD LR, USERS U WHERE LR.LESSON_RECORD_STATE='예약대기' AND LR.U_IDX=U.U_IDX) A WHERE LS.LESSON_SCHEDULE_IDX=A.LESSON_SCHEDULE_IDX)B WHERE B.LESSON_IDX=LL.LESSON_IDX AND T_IDX=#{t_idx}
SELECT LESSON_TYPE FROM LESSON_LIST WHERE LESSON_IDX=#{lesson_idx}

SELECT LL.*, LON.ONLINE_IDX, LON.ONLINE_SUBJ, LON.ONLINE_IMG, LON.ONLINE_FILE, LON.ONLINE_CONT FROM LESSON_LIST LL, LESSON_ONLINE LON WHERE LL.LESSON_IDX=LON.LESSON_IDX AND LL.LESSON_IDX=#{lesson_idx}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKE_LIST WHERE LESSON_IDX=#{lesson_idx}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LESSON_LIST

SELECT C.* FROM (SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT A.*, LS.LESSON_IDX FROM (SELECT R.*, LR.LESSON_SCHEDULE_IDX, LR.U_IDX FROM REVIEW R, LESSON_RECORD LR WHERE R.LESSON_RECORD_IDX=LR.LESSON_RECORD_IDX)A, LESSON_SCHEDULE LS WHERE A.LESSON_SCHEDULE_IDX=LS.LESSON_SCHEDULE_IDX)B, LESSON_LIST LL WHERE B.LESSON_IDX=LL.LESSON_IDX)C WHERE LESSON_IDX=#{lesson_idx}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lesson_list WHERE lesson_state = '진행' AND lesson_type = #{lesson_type}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lesson_list WHERE lesson_state = '진행' AND lesson_type = #{lesson_type} AND cate2_idx = #{cate2_idx}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM lesson_list a, cate2 b WHERE a.cate2_idx = b.cate2_idx AND lesson_state = '진행') c WHERE cate1_idx = #{cate1_idx}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lesson_list WHERE lesson_type = #{lesson_type} AND lesson_subj LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR lesson_short_cont LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lesson_list WHERE lesson_state = '진행' AND t_idx = #{t_idx}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum as rnum, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM LESSON_LIST WHERE lesson_state = '진행' ORDER BY lesson_idx DESC) a) b WHERE lesson_type = #{lesson_type} AND rnum>=#{start} AND rnum<=#{end}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum as rnum, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM LESSON_LIST WHERE lesson_state = '진행' ORDER BY lesson_idx DESC) a) b WHERE lesson_type = #{lesson_type} AND cate2_idx = #{cate2_idx} AND rnum>=#{start} AND rnum<=#{end}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum as rnum, c.* FROM (SELECT a.*, b.cate1_idx FROM lesson_list a, cate2 b WHERE a.cate2_idx = b.cate2_idx AND lesson_state = '진행' ORDER BY lesson_idx DESC) c) d WHERE cate1_idx = #{cate1_idx} AND rnum>=#{start} AND rnum<=#{end}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum AS rnum, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM lesson_list ORDER BY lesson_idx DESC) a) b WHERE lesson_type = #{lesson_type} AND rnum>=#{start} AND rnum<=#{end} AND (lesson_subj LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR lesson_short_cont LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum AS rnum, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM lesson_list WHERE lesson_state = '진행' AND t_idx = #{t_idx} ORDER BY lesson_idx DESC) a) b WHERE rnum>=#{start} AND rnum<=#{end}

SELECT * FROM LESSON_LIST WHERE T_IDX={t_idx}

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM lesson_schedule ls WHERE ls.lesson_start=to_date(#{lesson_time},'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT u.u_email FROM (SELECT t.u_idx FROM lesson_list ls, teacher t WHERE ls.lesson_idx=#{lesson_idx} AND ls.t_idx=t.t_idx) a, users u WHERE a.u_idx = u.u_idx
